tool.name: Fasta Sequence Renamer

param.label: New name for the fasta sequence
param.name: new_name

tool.help:
**What it does**
Allows re-naming a sequence with a new ID.
.. class:: warningmark
This tool will error if there is more than one sequence in your file!
**Example Inputs/Outputs**
For an input sequence::
>some-long-description and more useless information ACTG
This tool would let you rename the sequence something sensible like "phage_bob"::
>renamed [Orig=some-long-description] ACTG
